title: [SERIOUS] I have something to confess. I'm scared, but I'm just gonna come out and say it...
body:
[](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ak0wTzXq7i0/maxresdefault.jpg)

Look, I... I know it's not technically the right board for this, but Memes and Games has always been my favorite board. The people here are downright the friendliest of all the LoL community. I figured, why not tell this first to the people I trust most? If you guys accept me as what I am, then maybe it'll give me the courage to say this in real life to my family and friends...

So I need to tell you guys something and I want you all to be totally honest with me with your opinions. It might be awkward with us after this but I have to know how you guys feel, I have kept this in the closet of my mind for a while and it's about time I just come out and say it. I hope this doesn't ruin the relationship we already have, or cause you guys to see me differently. I just need to know what you guys think about this and I can't see any other way to get this over with. It just doesn't seem fair on me to spring this on you guys but I want you to tell me truthfully, no matter what it is, I just want your honest opinion about this....

So yeah, I'm just gonna come out and say it now...

http://g1.addtext.ft-uc.com/MjAxNzA0Mjc/addtext_com_MTAwMTAxMTM5MDA.jpg

replies.body:
https://giphy.com/gifs/the-office-no-steve-carell-12XMGIWtrHBl5e

Next you're going to tell me laughingfish isn't a fish but actually a human. How could you do this.
How does it go to the toilet
The cat side is grumpier for a reason.

They have one, so I suppose... somehow.

I don't want to imagine how.
Get out. your not apart of this family anymore.

the level of clickbate here is real.

You have made me proud.

I love cats. I have two 
Cable 
And Navi
http://i.imgur.com/jE2v0Sl.gifhttp://i.imgur.com/jE2v0Sl.gif well i bought the wrong food then .
Phew. And here I was thinking you were a freelo Lissandra abuser.
Oh God no. The lies! The pain! Too much to bear!

I am actually a Panda.

Oh, wait.
